fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Energy, Research and innovation
eu_initiatives:
Vi følger hovedsagelig alt vedrørende energipolitik, hovedsageligt omstillingen af fra det fossile samfund til det fossilfrie samfund ved hjælp af grøn energi, herunder aktiviteter der vedrører. 
•    Fremstilling af syntetiske brændstoffer 
•    Grøn transport (brintbiler) 
•    Afgiftspolitiker vedrørende omstilling til røn energi (nationale og internationale)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
The partnership for hydrogen and fuel cells, Denmark 
http://www.hydrogennet.dk
relevant_communication:
Vi deltager i en hel del projekter både nationale og internationale bl.a. følgende. 
•    FCpoweredRBS ”SP1-JTI-FCH.2010.4.2” Demonstration of industrial application readiness of fuel cell generators for power supply to off-grid stations, including the hydrogen supply solution 
•    Hyprovide “EUDP”  The overall objective is to develop a concept for large-scale alkaline electrolysers (Megawatt size) for hydrogen production. The target is to create a scalable modular electrolysis plant in the range from 125 Normal cubic metres pr. hour (Nm3/h) to 1000Nm3/h 
•    MeGa-stoRE “ForskEL” To development a modular platform for mechanization of CO2 from biogas to CH4. 
•    Analysis for Commercialization of Hydrogen Technologies “EUDP” The purpose of this project is to analyse and identify the need for more technological development of hydrogen technologies to be integrated in the future Danish Energy system. Barriers for introduction of hydrogen technologies in the future energy system will be identified. 
 
Herudover deltager vi aktivt I The Danish Partnership for Hydrogen and Fuel Cells,
goals__remit: GreenHydrogen.dk’s goal is to offer electrolyser systems with high efficiency and long lifetime to the market at competitive prices. The purpose of which is to store large amounts of renewable energy and produce CO2-free fuels
